name: Cyber Escape (itch) (VelizarUmbrat)
description:
A Sci-Fi FPS game, made with the help of Unreal Engine 4. Here the player's goal is to escape the maze-like building while sneaking around the enemy guards, or going guns blazing on them. In order to find the exit, three key cards must first be found, each one opening the location of the next.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Mouse - Rotate View

LMB - Shoot

Shift - Silent Walk

E - Use Keycard to Open Doors
